s.text: Of course they also say it's as easy to marry a rich man as a poor man, and that is definitely not true.

By the way, one of my sister Delia's most brilliant observations on life, and one that someone should have told Patricia Duff (not that she would have listened) is this: Never marry a man you wouldn't want to be divorced from.
Of course they also say it's as easy to marry a rich man as a poor man, and that is definitely not true.
I can't tell you how many men ask this question.
